item.title: Backpage executives to be sentenced after testifying against site founder about the site's sex ads
item.description: Two former executives for the now-shuttered classified site Backpage

item.title: Archdiocese agrees to $230M settlement in clergy sex abuse case, attorneys say
item.description: The New Orleans Archdiocese has agreed to a $230 million settlement for survivors of clergy sexual abuse

item.title: Drug dealer whose sentence was commuted found guilty of violating terms of release
item.description: A convicted New York drug dealer whose federal prison sentence had been commuted by President Donald Trump has been found guilty of violating the term...

item.title: Elderly California jewelry shop owner shoved to floor during brazen smash-and-grab robbery
item.description: An elderly jewelry shop owner in California has been violently attacked during a robbery

item.title: Appeals court upholds Myon Burrell's conviction in gun and drug case
item.description: An appeals court has upheld the conviction of a Minnesota man in a gun and drug case
